item.title: Reporter's Notebook: House attempts to override Trump vetoes on Colorado water project, Florida Everglades
item.description: House moves to override Trump vetoes on bipartisan Colorado water project and Florida Everglades bill that both passed unanimously in both chambers.

item.title: After 2 straight losses, Democrat Stacey Abrams sits out 2026 race for Georgia governor
item.description: Stacey Abrams announces she won't seek Georgia governorship in 2026, choosing instead to focus on fighting authoritarianism under Trump's presidency.
